title: Arsenal must show ´courage´ to win the Champions League, says Slegers
description: Renee Slegers urged her Arsenal players to show “courage” in their Champions League final against Barcelona as they aim to dethrone the title holders on Saturday. Arsenal take on the Blaugrana at the Estadio Jose Alvalade hoping to lift the crown for the second time in their history, having previously done so back in 2006-07. title: Como 0-2 Inter: Champions League finalists fall short in Scudetto race
description: Inter missed out on the Serie A title by a single point despite earning a 2-0 victory over 10-man Como. The Champions League finalists knew they had to rely on a favour from Cagliari against leaders Napoli on Friday, but Antonio Conte’s side got the job done.
